select APPLISTID, APPLISTNAME, APPLISTALIAS, DESCRIPTION, VERSION, STATUS, CATEGORY, RELEASETIME, LASTUPDATETIME, APPENTRY, ADMINENTRY, STATISTICSENTRY, ICONURL, LARGEICON_URL, HOMEPAGEURL, SIDEBARTITLE, SIDEBARENTRY, SIDEBARICON_URL, SIDEBARSUBMENU, SIDEBARACTIVE, AUTHORNAME, AUTHOREMAIL, AUTHORHOMEPAGEURL, CONTRIBUTORNAME, DISPLAYORDER, CRTIME from IRP_APPLIST
order by $orderByClause$

sqlMap.update:
update IRP_APPLIST
APPLISTID = #record.applistid:DECIMAL#
APPLISTNAME = #record.applistname:VARCHAR#
APPLISTALIAS = #record.applistalias:VARCHAR#
DESCRIPTION = #record.description:VARCHAR#
VERSION = #record.version:VARCHAR#
STATUS = #record.status:DECIMAL#
CATEGORY = #record.category:VARCHAR#
RELEASETIME = #record.releasetime:DATE#
LASTUPDATETIME = #record.lastupdatetime:DATE#
APPENTRY = #record.appentry:VARCHAR#
ADMINENTRY = #record.adminentry:VARCHAR#
STATISTICSENTRY = #record.statisticsentry:VARCHAR#
ICONURL = #record.iconurl:VARCHAR#
LARGEICON_URL = #record.largeiconUrl:VARCHAR#
HOMEPAGEURL = #record.homepageurl:VARCHAR#
SIDEBARTITLE = #record.sidebartitle:VARCHAR#
SIDEBARENTRY = #record.sidebarentry:VARCHAR#
SIDEBARICON_URL = #record.sidebariconUrl:VARCHAR#
SIDEBARSUBMENU = #record.sidebarsubmenu:DECIMAL#
SIDEBARACTIVE = #record.sidebaractive:DECIMAL#
AUTHORNAME = #record.authorname:VARCHAR#
AUTHOREMAIL = #record.authoremail:VARCHAR#
AUTHORHOMEPAGEURL = #record.authorhomepageurl:VARCHAR#
CONTRIBUTORNAME = #record.contributorname:VARCHAR#
DISPLAYORDER = #record.displayorder:DECIMAL#
CRTIME = #record.crtime:DATE#

update IRP_APPLIST
APPLISTNAME = #applistname:VARCHAR#
APPLISTALIAS = #applistalias:VARCHAR#
DESCRIPTION = #description:VARCHAR#
VERSION = #version:VARCHAR#
STATUS = #status:DECIMAL#
CATEGORY = #category:VARCHAR#
RELEASETIME = #releasetime:DATE#
LASTUPDATETIME = #lastupdatetime:DATE#
APPENTRY = #appentry:VARCHAR#
ADMINENTRY = #adminentry:VARCHAR#
STATISTICSENTRY = #statisticsentry:VARCHAR#
ICONURL = #iconurl:VARCHAR#
LARGEICON_URL = #largeiconUrl:VARCHAR#
HOMEPAGEURL = #homepageurl:VARCHAR#
SIDEBARTITLE = #sidebartitle:VARCHAR#
SIDEBARENTRY = #sidebarentry:VARCHAR#
SIDEBARICON_URL = #sidebariconUrl:VARCHAR#
SIDEBARSUBMENU = #sidebarsubmenu:DECIMAL#
SIDEBARACTIVE = #sidebaractive:DECIMAL#
AUTHORNAME = #authorname:VARCHAR#
AUTHOREMAIL = #authoremail:VARCHAR#
AUTHORHOMEPAGEURL = #authorhomepageurl:VARCHAR#
CONTRIBUTORNAME = #contributorname:VARCHAR#
DISPLAYORDER = #.displayorder:DECIMAL#
CRTIME = #crtime:DATE#
where APPLISTID = #applistid:DECIMAL#

update IRP_APPLIST set APPLISTID = #record.applistid:DECIMAL#, APPLISTNAME = #record.applistname:VARCHAR#, APPLISTALIAS = #record.applistalias:VARCHAR#, DESCRIPTION = #record.description:VARCHAR#, VERSION = #record.version:VARCHAR#, STATUS = #record.status:DECIMAL#, CATEGORY = #record.category:VARCHAR#, RELEASETIME = #record.releasetime:DATE#, LASTUPDATETIME = #record.lastupdatetime:DATE#, APPENTRY = #record.appentry:VARCHAR#, ADMINENTRY = #record.adminentry:VARCHAR#, STATISTICSENTRY = #record.statisticsentry:VARCHAR#, ICONURL = #record.iconurl:VARCHAR#, LARGEICON_URL = #record.largeiconUrl:VARCHAR#, HOMEPAGEURL = #record.homepageurl:VARCHAR#, SIDEBARTITLE = #record.sidebartitle:VARCHAR#, SIDEBARENTRY = #record.sidebarentry:VARCHAR#, SIDEBARICON_URL = #record.sidebariconUrl:VARCHAR#, SIDEBARSUBMENU = #record.sidebarsubmenu:DECIMAL#, SIDEBARACTIVE = #record.sidebaractive:DECIMAL#, AUTHORNAME = #record.authorname:VARCHAR#, AUTHOREMAIL = #record.authoremail:VARCHAR#, AUTHORHOMEPAGEURL = #record.authorhomepageurl:VARCHAR#, CONTRIBUTORNAME = #record.contributorname:VARCHAR#, DISPLAYORDER = #record.displayorder:DECIMAL#, CRTIME = #record.crtime:DATE#
update IRP_APPLIST set STATUS = #status:DECIMAL# where APPLISTID = #applistid:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.select: select APPLISTID, APPLISTNAME, APPLISTALIAS, DESCRIPTION, VERSION, STATUS, CATEGORY, RELEASETIME, LASTUPDATETIME, APPENTRY, ADMINENTRY, STATISTICSENTRY, ICONURL, LARGEICON_URL, HOMEPAGEURL, SIDEBARTITLE, SIDEBARENTRY, SIDEBARICON_URL, SIDEBARSUBMENU, SIDEBARACTIVE, AUTHORNAME, AUTHOREMAIL, AUTHORHOMEPAGEURL, CONTRIBUTORNAME, DISPLAYORDER, CRTIME from IRP_APPLIST where APPLISTID = #applistid:DECIMAL#

select APPLISTID, APPLISTNAME, APPLISTALIAS, DESCRIPTION, VERSION, STATUS, CATEGORY, RELEASETIME, LASTUPDATETIME, APPENTRY, ADMINENTRY, STATISTICSENTRY, ICONURL, LARGEICON_URL, HOMEPAGEURL, SIDEBARTITLE, SIDEBARENTRY, SIDEBARICON_URL, SIDEBARSUBMENU, SIDEBARACTIVE, AUTHORNAME, AUTHOREMAIL, AUTHORHOMEPAGEURL, CONTRIBUTORNAME, DISPLAYORDER, CRTIME from IRP_APPLIST where status=0 and applistid in(select applistid from IRP_USER_APP where isdisplay=0 and userid =#userid:DECIMAL#)

select APPLISTID, APPLISTNAME, APPLISTALIAS, DESCRIPTION, VERSION, STATUS, CATEGORY, RELEASETIME, LASTUPDATETIME, APPENTRY, ADMINENTRY, STATISTICSENTRY, ICONURL, LARGEICON_URL, HOMEPAGEURL, SIDEBARTITLE, SIDEBARENTRY, SIDEBARICON_URL, SIDEBARSUBMENU, SIDEBARACTIVE, AUTHORNAME, AUTHOREMAIL, AUTHORHOMEPAGEURL, CONTRIBUTORNAME, DISPLAYORDER, CRTIME from IRP_APPLIST where status=#status:DECIMAL# and applistid in(select applistid from IRP_USER_APP where isdisplay=#isdisplay:DECIMAL# and userid =#userid:DECIMAL#)
select count(*) from IRP_APPLIST where status=#status:DECIMAL# and applistid in(select applistid from IRP_USER_APP where isdisplay=#isdisplay:DECIMAL# and userid =#userid:DECIMAL#)

select APPLISTID, APPLISTNAME, APPLISTALIAS, DESCRIPTION, VERSION, STATUS, CATEGORY, RELEASETIME, LASTUPDATETIME, APPENTRY, ADMINENTRY, STATISTICSENTRY, ICONURL, LARGEICON_URL, HOMEPAGEURL, SIDEBARTITLE, SIDEBARENTRY, SIDEBARICON_URL, SIDEBARSUBMENU, SIDEBARACTIVE, AUTHORNAME, AUTHOREMAIL, AUTHORHOMEPAGEURL, CONTRIBUTORNAME, DISPLAYORDER, CRTIME from IRP_APPLIST where status=#status:DECIMAL# and applistid not in(select applistid from IRP_USER_APP where isdisplay=#isdisplay:DECIMAL# and userid =#userid:DECIMAL#)
select count(*) from IRP_APPLIST where status=#status:DECIMAL# and applistid not in(select applistid from IRP_USER_APP where isdisplay=#isdisplay:DECIMAL# and userid =#userid:DECIMAL#)
